# suggestions

**Instance Property**

Search parameters to offer as shortcuts.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute Array suggestions;
```

## Discussion

Provide search suggestions to help the user complete their query quickly. Update the suggestions as the user types. This property is only available if the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/keyboard] is associated with a [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/searchfield].

Each suggestion in this array should have the following properties:





## Providing and Handling Search Suggestions

- **onSuggestionSelected**: A function the system calls when the user selects a suggestion on a search field.
